content.prompt: Which of the following examples describes the core value of equality of opportunity?

choices.label: A student gains admittance to a university without the hindrance of racial discrimination.
A person is hired at a workplace because the hiring manager prefers younger employees.
A business owner receives a loan from a bank as a result of growing up with the bank manager.
A citizen is appointed to a school board through political connections with the mayor.

topic.text: 4.1: American Attitudes About Government and Politics

skill.text: Skill 1.D: Describe political principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors illustrated in different scenarios in context.
